idea-plugin.name: Live SQL Query Explainer
idea-plugin.description:
Live SQL Query Explainer helps developers understand SQL queries inline, directly within IntelliJ-based IDEs.

Key features include:

  • Inline SQL explanation in plain English with helpful visual cues
  • Support for common SQL operations: SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE
  • Detailed breakdowns of SQL clauses like JOIN, WHERE, GROUP BY, ORDER BY, and LIMIT
  • A dedicated tool window to view and experiment with built-in sample queries
  • Sample queries for all supported SQL types to help you learn or debug easily

Ideal for beginners learning SQL and professionals debugging complex queries.
